PerfectNetExp.abs: punctated 有小斑点的punctilio 细节punctilious 精密细心的
以o结尾的英语英文单词 ... pueblo 印第安人村庄 punctilio 细节,拘泥形式,拘束 quarto 四开,四开大的书本.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Italian puntiglio(n-) and Spanish puntillo, diminutive of punto 'a point'

means.word_mean: 1. a fine point of etiquette or petty formality
